name: Celsius (mikelovesrobots)
description:
This game was made as part of Train Jam under very challenging conditions, sub-zero sleeping temperatures, sleeping on cafeteria floors, on a train that was often rolling backwards as much as it was forwards, and was a pivot after I had abandoned my first day's game as being too ambitious to possibly finish.

I hope you like it. I think I succeeded at making a weird atmospheric game with almost no instructions and great sound. The different elements in the world respond to your presence.
